page.title: 19Typical Home Life in 1985
page.content: On a typical Saturday I get up to see what the weather is like.In summer,if it's fine,I like to swim in the river. First though,I put on my jeans and T- shirt and eat breakfast(usually toast) In winter,if there is snow,I watch T.V.or go sledging.In the afternoons I like to play football with my mates. Sometimes I act as caddie for my dad when he plays golf in Barnard Castle. It takes about 3 hours for him to play a complete round of 18 holes.I even clean his shoes for him (a hard job because of the spikes in the sole). Tea-time is when we all have a snack meal with sandwiches and cake.Later I switch on the T.V.I like Grange Hill, which is a programme about a school.I enjoy watching sport as well.Sometimes I like to read adventure books.Usually I go to bed at about nine o'clock and continue reading for a short while.
